website_summaries.verdict: A generous set of pretty, realistic-looking LED candles that provide many uses, from adding warm glow to numerous places around the house to an attractive table focal point.
pros: Nine flameless ivory candles that earn praise for looking realistic
Include a variety of popular sizes and a remote with the capability of setting the candles to an on/off timer
Can adjust the brightness level or set them to flicker
Each candle also has an on/off switch
cons: Life of the batteries is compromised with frequent setting of the timer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to see they were thinner than some other flameless candles. The amount of candles for the price is fantastic! The different sizes are great for group settings in different areas... I can't post any pictures yet because my boyfriend is giving them to me for Christmas so I'm not allowed to play with them yet! CANT WAIT!!! Update!!!! The remote is fantastic and they look beautiful! So easy to use and install batteries. The hardest thing is deciding where to go use them!
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these lanterns for years and never the right size or number of candles for them. I stumbled across these candles and thought the quantity and height range seemed perfect. It’s hard to find LED candles over 6”. They are exactly what I was looking for. Great price for the quality and quantity. I love, love these candles! The remote with variable timer settings is so convenient. The candles produce such a pretty glow. I think they’re just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Clowe

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Battery compartment does not shut securely. Batteries are somewhat loose. Lights go off and on when the candles are moved/bumped. Outside is dipped in real wax, so not only can it melt in warm temperatures, the wax leaves a mess on your furniture. One candle’s bulb had fallen down inside the pillar rather than being in the wick. No way to fix it. If grouped separately, remote must be pointed at each group to turn off/on. Look nice. Nice brightness. Returned item. Posted a video demonstrating all these points.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: ... really excited for these however quality is not that good. remote sucks
customer_reviews.text: was really excited for these however quality is not that good. remote sucks! what good is a remote when you have to be literally standing right over top the candles to light them?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Several died after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: These candles worked well for about 8 months. One of the candles never turned on via remote, but I could turn it on with the button underneath. I was initially surprised at how skinny the candles were, but I quickly got used to that. I loved the "flicker" option and enjoyed them glowing at night. But the batteries had to be changed often and about a month ago, four of the candles stopped working. I changed the batteries and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality - stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - amazing price - looks and works great for the first few weeks/months - I like the timer on/off function, brightness adjusting and duration Cons - cheap quality - sometimes you have to wiggle the battery panel otherwise the candle won’t turn on at all - not sure if you have to use special battery because regular AA battery only last 2-3 weeks and if you think about replacing all the batteries that often... I would have rather have spent more money at home goods for one/two candles that lasts way longer and better quality than these IMO
customer_reviews.author: Annie Feng

customer_reviews.title: Work great as long as you don't block the base so the signal can't get through.
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for. Initially, I thought maybe the circuits were messed up since some candles weren't responding to the remote. But I quickly realized it was user error. The candles that were nestled in garland and string lights weren't receiving the signal because it was blocked. If I aimed the remote towards the base from above instead of seated in my comfy chair, then they worked with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not sure if there's a better option
customer_reviews.text: So... The Pros: ~Made from wax ~The remote is a great feature ~The option of using different levels of light is nice ~No mess ~No fire hazard ~No smell ~There is a feature that you can push on the remote to make the candles flicker. The Cons: ~It requires 2 AA batteries for each candle, so you need 18 batteries. The remote comes with a battery, but not sure how long that will work. ~Not all of the candles actually work consistently. Some take a few minutes to work. ~The color of the flame is okay, not as realistic as I had hoped. It is orange, not a white light like the picture at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bet Hank

customer_reviews.title: Set the mood!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. These are not going to light up a room, as they are more for ambiance. I cannot control them with the remote from my couch, which is about 10 feet away. I have to be about 6 feet from them to control with remote. I have four of them in each lantern. When I turn them on they all flicker at the same rate. I kinda wish it was more random between each candle. They put out a very warm yellowish orange hue.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas G

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. My grandma got me these for Christmas and I was very excited to receive them. When I opened it everything felt very flimsy and cheap. The battery covers didnt stay on a lot of them and when I put brand new batteries on the ones where the covers stayed on, most of them didnt even work! Turning them on and off with the remote was a huge hassle because it didnt work most of the time. Now writing this review I noticed I didnt even recieve the product from the correct manufacturer. Extremely disappointed, not to mention frustrated. What can I say about this product, it was cheap cheap cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.  Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: First set had two dead on arrival candles. We were able to get one of them working by manipulating the contact in the battery compartment. I reported the other to the seller. They responded quickly saying they were sending a replacement. They sent a whole knew set which surprised me but Two didn’t work. So good customer service but cheap product. So go into knowing that you are paying a quality price for the low price. Also had I bought them as a gift, I would have been too embarrassed to give hem away. They came in a box similar to the Enpornk brand but instead of the brand name, said, “Good Electronics” in an Oriental style font.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not good on the second set I bought. I have them both set the same level of brightness and same batteries. My first set the battery life lasts so long! I liked them so much and was so happy with them that I bought some for my daughter. The second set loses battery power way quicker!. Also the remote control does not work on the “On” button, you have to hit the button below which is the 2 hr button to turn them on. Disappointed with the second set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: You've come a long way, baby!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased during Corona Lock-Down to use instead of the tall 5-day glass candles from the grocery. I always had those on-hand for when someone is ill or passes, to remind us through the day of them and their families. I thought flameless candles were probably nice but hyped. No hype - these are really nice and they work! Remote works! Candles feel so nice and look even better. The remote will make frequent use even easier -- set the time and walk away. I plan on using these more than I anticipated for many more purposes. I will give it an overall rating of 5 stars if they last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: SparklesInNashville

customer_reviews.title: Fixed flame
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok-ish. The flame mechanism is more of a fixed plastic bulb like the fake plastic candles from decades ago, like the ones that people put in Pennsylvania windows around Christmas time in the 1990's. Because of this it doesn't have a random flicker like Luminara or many of it's more modern competitors, there is a 3-5 second flicker pattern that is really noticeable and detracts from any belief that these are real candles. I tried 5 different brands for Christmas presents and this was the only brand to use this much older technique. While there are a lot of candles for the price, you certainly get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Diver Brad

customer_reviews.title: Get the candles!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE CANDLES! I love having a real wood flickering fire but we live in Texas and that's just not as often as I'd like. So, the candles give off just the right ambiance and light to relax in the evening and wind down before bed. I've had them about 2 months and as you can see from the pictures they work great. My only criticism is that the remote doesn't usually catch all the candles at once. Meaning you have to push the on button two or three times before all the candles are lit but that doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many flameless candles in the past and this is one by far is the best quality set I've had and at a fraction of the price PLUS it includes a remote! Makes it so easy to turn on/off with different settings to either have a steady light or a flickering candle light and it has a brightener & dimmer so you're able to achieve a bright white to a warm white light to set the mood you're looking for. I was surprised at how far the remotes would work away from the candles. These were a great value. I plan on purchasing another set.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Milillo

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I like the skinnness if the candle to off set the bulky things. I was happy with the battery life 4-5months(everyday use). So are on high shelves and that’s be a pain to continually have to change out batteries. The remote you do have to get a little close and press a few time to get all candles. I believe when the batteries start to die the candles with start just popping on after you turned them off. That’s the only weird thing I’ve noted plus one out of the nine I found stated to corrode when I went to change out the batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F McDermott

customer_reviews.title: All candles 'flicker' at same rate.. looks weird.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the big set. When first unwrapping these candles, they look and smell great. And the flickering mode looks cool... if it's just one candle. My big objection was that when multiple candles are placed near to each other, they all flicker together. It looks fake, unnatural, and it's a dumb problem easily solved. The flicker should be totally random, not all candles synchronized. Three stars because it does what it says it does and little else. I returned them and would not recommend unless you intend to have only one candle within sight at any one time, or not use the flicker mode.
customer_reviews.author: G. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so I ordered these for my upcoming wedding so they could sit on some candle holders I have. Unfortunately, they are way too small in diameter to fit the 3" diameter of the holder. I should've read more about it, but they are still really nice.. they are just much smaller than I had expected them to be. I really like that they come with a remote and can be dimmed. However, if you are wanting a larger diameter candle, do not go with these. We plan on keeping them because we can still use them somewhere else, but they will not serve the purpose we originally bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Branham

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Plusses
customer_reviews.text: This large set of real wax flameless candles provides safe and convenient decorative lighting. While currently being used as bar lighting until our under-cabinet lights are installed, these will eventually make their way into our fireplace as an alternative to wood fires, as our climate is to warm for them. The remote control and automatic timing make these ideal mood lighting, and the flameless nature is perfect for households with pets a/o children. My only caveat is that they don't appear as candle-like as they could, and the 'real wax' exterior can be easily damaged like a true candle, and will collect dust and hair the same, without a true candles' temporary nature.
customer_reviews.author: keygirlTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We love these candles. They look realistic because they are made of wax on the outside, and the “candle” mode option makes the light flicker like real candles. You also have the option to have the light not flicker and just stay on. I also like the option where I can set a timer on the candles and have them turn off after 2, 4, 6, or 8 hours-helps save the battery life! Remote is very basic and low quality, so will need to make sure not to drop or step on it. Otherwise, I highly recommend because they are a great deal for what you get out of then.
customer_reviews.author: Weelosh

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these led candles! They are a little thinner than anticipated, but it worked out fine for the tin lantern I wanted them for. I have 9 together in the tin lantern, turn them all on at once with the remote. They flicker simultaneously at first, but after a minute or two they flicker at different times, giving a very realistic candle effect. Buying more for sure! So far, I've had them on the 4 hour timer, which turns them on every night at the time I set the timer. So far 60 days on originally installed batteries, much better than my previous candles
customer_reviews.author: D.Schibel

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Work great, and are beautiful.  Bargain too!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong here. I've used the ones with the plastic flame shaped nub, and never liked them. They all benefit from a bit of distance, but when on, and you'll LOVE the remote...they flicker just like a candle, and the battery lasts months-seriously-months. I bought them to use outside at night, and they look like real candles, in fact, a friend asked me why the didn't blow out in the breezes. Remember when used outdoors, they are wax coated, and melt in the sun or heat, so use them from dusk on. I watered one too, don't do that....now I take then in after we go inside. GREAT BARGAIN! Very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: GeorginaK

customer_reviews.title: Great for fireplace, but the remote can be glitchy
customer_reviews.text: Since our fireplace isn't usable at the moment, I bought these to put in there instead for decoration. The light is more yellow than I'd like it to be and they're smaller than I pictured, but the candles work great and I love the flame mode. The remote seems to be a tad glitchy though. You have to be really close to the candles for it to work and sometimes it only shuts off a couple when you press the power button, so you have to keep pressing it until all are turned off. It does that with the modes too sometimes. Other than that I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: Easy safe ambience setting plus safe to use during power outages.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my third set. Two as gifts. Great emergency use besides I love the ease of use and how you can set up such a lovely setting. Years ago I saw these and being very safety conscientious though they were fantastic. I had a cat sit on a real lit candle before no problem but had a it could of been a streak of a fireball. Also someone set my duplex on fire before leaving a burning candle unattended a 35,000 cost.Great product use the Amazon batteries. They seem to be work excellent with them. Think safe.
customer_reviews.author: Buildingmykokomo

customer_reviews.title: They're only okay.
customer_reviews.text: I made the error of thinking these candles were wider than they are. Regardless, I don't like them as much as others I've purchased. The flicker effect is build inside instead of created by a flat simulated flame that fluctuates. Additionally, we've had trouble getting them to work consistently. We've used both regular batteries and rechargeable batteries, yet some of them end up not working and this is with little use. If you like a more narrow diameter, they you'll like these. I should have read the information provided more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: KayPW

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay.
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin compared to other flameless candles I owned. While the exterior looks and feels nice, the battery compartments are very cheaply made, you can lightly tap them and they turn on and off without actually flipping the switch. The remote works fine but not all the candles turn on and off at the same time, you have to keep hitting on and off to get them all activated. Haven’t used the timer yet but I’m wondering if all of them will even turn on with the timer. They’re okay for the price but I’d rather spend more for better quality for sure.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Making my bath time fancy since May 2020- requires A lOT if batteries
customer_reviews.text: I originally ought these as a gift for my mother-in-law for Mother’s Day, and then decided, I’m a mom too, and I like me more.. 😂 And I am super glad I kept them. I love them! They were cheap, and make a great addition to my bath time routine. I like to read and drink wine in the tub 🤷🏼‍♀️ They do look a little more fake in person than the example picture, but much like an ugly date- you can’t really tell in the dark 😅
customer_reviews.author: Kirston Haley

customer_reviews.title: You will need LOTS of batteries. Lol
customer_reviews.text: You will need 18 AA batteries to run all of these! Otherwise love them! They look as expected. Remote only works about 2 feet away or less which is a little annoying but who cares! It comes with a remote! The candle option (as seen in video) doesn’t really make them “flicker” like other battery candles more like the light just goes up and down.. if that makes sense. All in all great for the price. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Augusta Renee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The candles are a bit thinner than I expected, I had purchased something similar from Michael's and did not double check size, but I don't mind that at all and the candles are very beautiful. I did have to put the batteries in opposite from the instructions on the bottom of the candle. The remote works from across my living room and I love the timer feature. I have only been using them for a couple days now so I don't know what the battery life it is like.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great product to decorate with
customer_reviews.text: So I should of read more on this product. We had just moved to a new house when I decided to purchase these. The multiple sizes are great to decorate and was easy to get set up. I didn’t realize it was on a time though so I was a little freaked out to see them turn on when I hadn’t used the remote haha. The batteries have been in them for 3 months now and have not died which is nice since you have to use many. I also like that you can pick the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: One candle was wired backwards, another had a loose connection to the battery holder and had to be wiggled to get it to turn on. A 3rd candle had a short around the on/off switch, so it was on 100% of the time once the batteries were inserted. I'd recommend finding a better quality set to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: XGenic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but I may have a faulty set
customer_reviews.text: These candles once all on are beautiful! However after only using for 2 hours 3 candels do not flicker and the remote does not work. Also, when using the remote to change the different functions I have to click the same button multiple times as it only turns the function on for 1 or 2 candles at a time. I’m not sure if I just have a faulty set or if I need a replacement. In order to turn them off I had to manually turn them off as the remote didn’t work. Otherwise they are beautiful and look and feel like real candles
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R Leon

customer_reviews.title: Requires a lot of batteries but very realistic
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice candles They feel real and they emit a nice warm color You can change them from a standard flicker like a real candle or a steady light, they are also dim-able! The only con I have with them is they require A LOT of batteries and they are not included These took 18 AA Batteries!! I love how you point the remote at the individual candles themselves and you can turn them off and on I have noticed just from picking them up and putting them down they will turn on as well So far I am a fan of them and I love the mood they set for a room!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Almost just right
customer_reviews.text: I fell bad knocking stars out for this, but it's on the same frequency as my TV remote, so they're basically worthless, especially the timer function. Fyi, i have an LG OLED. They are just the right brightness though for what id want. The only other semi annoying thing is the receiver for the remote signal is the base of the candle, so if i want them to come on, i need to go up to them as they are behind my sound bar. They come on very easily though with the TV remote. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 2 of the candles don't work with the remote and ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the candles don't work with the remote and cannot be set to turn off automatically. After unpacking and installing the 18 AA batteries, I don't want to repackage and send back. I guess I'll just settle for 7 candles. I JUST CHANGED TO 1 STAR. NOW ONLY 6 CANDLES WORK. TOO BIG OF A HASSLE TO RETURN.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: So many candles. And they're WAX!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are made out of wax, because it makes them feel and look like regular candles. The only problem I have is that each requires two AA batteries, so to load them all up takes 18 batteries (not included). It really wasn't a huge problem because we have a lot of the rechargeable batteries here. Clicking one button the remote and turning them all on or off is awesome. Perfect to set any mood, any time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, realistic, calming, convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in an evening yoga class I teach and ended up setting them out in my apartment when I'm not using them in my class. I love the way they look, just like real candles! And I love that I can just point the remote and turn them on from the sofa when the sun goes down. Another great feature is the flicker - there is an option to have the flame be constant (no flickering) or you can make the flame flicker just as a real candle would. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: No more wax on everything!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are terrific. I just purchased two more sets after purchasing the first set. My wife and I enjoy having candles around in the evenings to help set the mood for cooking, relaxing, reading, and just plain zoning out. We can put these anywhere without worrying about wax dripping on everything and the potential of starting a fire. Being real wax, well, they are real candles. The lighting mechanism looks real and you very soon forget that there is a non-flame element. Plus, the remote control is easy to use and it actually delivers what it is supposed to do. We will be buying more soon.
customer_reviews.author: LifeIsGrand

customer_reviews.title: Great life-like candles
customer_reviews.text: These led candles are great! They look so real with the flickering feature. They have been on for 4 hours every day for 2 months with the same batteries. The timing feature on them is awesome! I purchased Amazon batteries to go with it and they haven't failed yet for as much use as they have had. I don't like the cleaning and mess of a wood burning fireplace, so this was a great addition to it for a nice peaceful atmosphere. The battery compartment door is a bit cheap but I have had no problems with them so far. This was a great purchase and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: FlyLkNEgl

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a change
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were both having eye problems with the "fumes" from real candles, so we had to make a change. Much to our surprise these candles are fun — turn them all on/off at the same time, if in the same general area; flicker or not, and time for shutoff. Timer doesn't work as well as it should, since the 4hr had about one-third turn off after three hours instead; not a major issue, but could use improvement. Batteries lasting nicely, so far.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaQuest

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as what I'm replacing but I'll make it work
customer_reviews.text: One candle cuts off after a couple seconds until you bang it. There was an extra bottom connecter in the box so I think mine had been returned before for the same issue. The candles are skinnier than my last remote LED candles that I am having to replace and the remote range is very, very short/easily blocked. Amazon was helpful when I called but they couldn't get a replacement to me for two days and I needed for tonight and tomorrow so I ended up just keeping them. Did the job I wanted it to and I'm keeping.
customer_reviews.author: busy bee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candles
customer_reviews.text: We have a six month old, very curious kitten in our home. Real candles were no longer an option due yo safety. I found Enpornk’s set and fell in love instantly. They are made with real wax, smell like real candles when they are “burning”, and look absolutely beautiful. This is not only a worthwhile purchase, it would be a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to shine behind a curved glass image. The illumination is just perfect! AND I don't have to worry about the candle tipping over by accident. They are made of wax and on many dimensions as close to realistic as possible. The remote is so funny, but with the timer makes things so very easy! The shipping was fast and everything was packed well! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: These candles are the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for decoration and I normally love real candles. So, I decided to try something that will last longer. These candles light up well and they have a feature where you can dim them or make them brighter. They have an option for flicker so I would use that on some of the candles. It made a great 'coming out of winter' decoration and I never had to turn them on and off. I just used the remote and put them on a timer.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: WAY disappointed in the company.
customer_reviews.text: Good Candles, But, WAY disappointed in the company. The package had been returned from another client before I got it. The remote battery was not working, There were old batteries left in a few of the candles (which of course caused oxidation and ruined the candles), And one of the candles didn't have any sort of plastic cover on it, and it was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Review

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The wax part is fine, but the internals of the candles are horrible. You can hear loose pieces rattling around inside them, and the battery contacts are so finicky that the candles will turn themselves off just from being set down on a counter top. Remote didn't work out of the box despite having an included battery. I'm not sure whether the battery arrived dead, or the remote is completely defective. I don't really have the patience to find out. The candles can't be switched to flicker mode without the remote, which is really all I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Logan S.

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved lighting candles in my home but now we have two cats and I thought I would try these out. Received them today. Fortunately I did have 18 AA batteries that were needed because it does not include it. They flowed nicely and you are able to set it for a subtle flickering if you want. They look so pretty and I’m happy I got them.
customer_reviews.author: PHCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!! Cheap and doesn’t work!!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and do not buy these candles! I am completely disappointed with this product. The candles look great, but after placing 2 AA batteries in each candle only 3 of the 9 candles work. The bottom closure doesn’t close properly and this is obviously a cheaply made product. I would return the item but it is too much of a hassle for me so it was a total waste :(
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Flickering candle flames
customer_reviews.text: I'm a person that loves candles and I light one in my apartment every evening. I guess its something about the smell and flickering flames. This set gives me everything but the smell, but its ok and the remote is excellent. When yu don't want too much light when watchimg a movie in front of large screen TV these candles can go from high to low, still flame or flickering flames. Luv it!🕯
customer_reviews.author: WDS

customer_reviews.title: Nice candle set at reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: The candle set looks like real candles. Remote has feature to flicker like flame or solid for a slightly brighter feature. I would have rated higher if all the candles worked. As you can see from the grouped set, one does not. I purchased two sets of these as I needed one for wedding gift add on, I will be really disappointed if the gift set is not fully functional. I have not tried the timers yet, but it runs from 2 to 8 hrs. There is a dimming feature but I see no difference. Nice buy for price.
customer_reviews.author: Corynda

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are very realistic looking candles. So much so that I was a bit rough on one of them and a bit of wax cane off. I was able to attach it back on just fine. The candles change color and you can change if you want a steady flame or a flickering one. I used my candles for a Romantic Birthday set up at a hotel. They looked great. The candles are great but this companies customer service is even better. One of my candles came without the piece that holds the battery in which means it could not work and the seller immediately send out a replacement. Will definitely be doing business again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Aloe

customer_reviews.title: Beware: 18 batteries needed
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just overlooked it, but each candle requires 2 batteries. I thought they took 1 battery each. The wax gives a great real candle vibe and the remote gives the option to flicker like a candle or steadily stay on like a light. However, all of the candles do not turn off and on at the same time. There is a delay when some are individually switched on. There is also a delay for which ones will/won't turn on/off at the same time when using the remote. Even with these issues, I would (and probably will) purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Cook

customer_reviews.title: Timers don't always work
customer_reviews.text: I loved these candles but timer function doesn't always work with all of the candles. I've tried several ways to set them up but some come on and shut off every night like they should and others just stay on and never shut off. I tried to set them up together and then separately to see if it would make a difference but it doesn't. Very frustrating. Otherwise they're nice looking candles and I love the flicker feature.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic candles, great features, and Big Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are a terrific value, are well made, realistic looking, and perfect for what we purchased them for. Our kids wanted to add candles to our outdoor Halloween graveyard decorations and they work beautifully. The timer function is especially great for saving battery life. The remote control is convenient, but you have to click on each candle as they don’t all sync together with one click. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Corrado

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: These work well over all. Sometimes they turn off or on randomly. Or when you set them down firmly. Sometimes you have to hit the on or off button a few times to get them to all turn on or off. Be aware, they are fully wax exterior. I left these in my she shed and some of them melted and collapsed. Not knocking points off for that, I knew they were wax and that the shed gets warm. Just giving info.
customer_reviews.author: Ars Technica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the product description.
customer_reviews.text: I like the realistic look of the candles. The ability to dim or brighten the light is a good feature. The timer does not work. I set the timer to go off after six hours but only three of the candles turned off. I am somewhat disappointed by this. I wish I could give the candles a better rating but they don't live up to the product description. I expected a better product especially since it was labeled as an Amazon choice.
customer_reviews.author: scowardin

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: We have bought a couple varieties of candles to setup as halloween decorations and while I've only had these going for a few nights they seem great. I was worried about a few things from other reviews such as brightness and the functionality of the remote control but so far so good. you can adjust the brightness and they are bright enough that the automatic nightlights do not trigger with them on. the remote controls them from a decent distance but not so far away that you cant adjust individuals or groups separately. will probably buy at least one more set before halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these soooo much
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo amazing - I have used them for my Halloween and Fall decorations so far. I love the remote feature, it foes not turn them all off or on at once unless you have them all next to each other. I have mine placed all around my room and just have to aim the remote in the direction of the candles and push the off/on button. Love these. they are on the slender side which is what I was looking for. Feels like wax not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are perfect. I did not realize they were thinner than all of the other candles I have and was initially disappointed, but over time I have come to love them. They look sleek and beautiful. Updated review. These candles have started to be very unreliable. The part that holds the part in is not that secure, and I have to jiggle the cangles to make the battteries connect and for the candles to come on. Disappointed overall because they ARE beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Aaron

customer_reviews.title: De-lighted!
customer_reviews.text: I have a fear of falling asleep whilst burning candles, particularly after a relaxing bath and although I purchased these originally to use for an outdoor party, I find I use them often indoors. They look convincingly real, do not smell, and allow me to drift off without worry. I never use the remote or timer because I’m too impatient to bother to read the instructions. Maybe one day...
customer_reviews.author: High Standards

customer_reviews.title: Safe, Beautiful, Great Quality ✨
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE ✨🤍 these candles are perfect, they each use 2 AA Batteries and the remote is amazing. I love candles but I am always afraid of falling asleep and starting a fire haha so, these candles are amazing the the Timer setting on the remote is great. I tested out the 2 hour timer and it shuts off just as it should. These are perfect for some extra lighting without the mess and fire 🔥 such great quality for a good price! I deff recommend Follow me for more amazing AmazonPrime finds & style ideas @JillianStaebler
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Delivered today, put in brand new batteries and only one candle works. Double checked battery placement and still not working. Returning asap. Will continue looking for a nice set of battery powered candles.
customer_reviews.author: s.sal

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but aggravating
customer_reviews.text: I really love the way these look, but wish I had gotten plastic. No difference in looks & these are much more fragile. Each one takes 2 AA batteries so investment is nearly doubled over initial cost. Both times function & remote are hit & miss. Works one time, not the next. Don't pay more in anticipation of these working well.
customer_reviews.author: mountianhome

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I can get past the fact that they are very skinny. They are not like the wider candles that I have ordered before that I am still searching for now. The main problem is that they don’t stay lit. I have brand new batteries in all of them and they stay lit for maybe 2 to 5 minutes and then the flame goes out. These are such a waste of money. I recommend to keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: JLFS

customer_reviews.title: I just got these candles and I didn't like them at all sending them back Monday
customer_reviews.text: I just got these candles and I didn't like them at all sending them back Monday ..they don't look natural and very dark and not much flame you can't even see the flame ...my husband who never makes comments about what I buy ever said to me these are terrible he told me to go and buy a regular candle would be better than this ...I will check out different candles ..Don't waste time on these abundance doesn't mean a better deal quality is better to shop for ..
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ivanow

customer_reviews.title: Demon possessed candles
customer_reviews.text: First of all these candles are possessed!!! They do what they want when they want (kinda sounds like my ex husband). Anywho they are skinny candles which I wasn’t really looking for but it’s okay they look nice. There are many sizes which is nice, but again they are possessed by the candle gods! They all don’t respond to the remote like right now I have one flickering candle and the rest are just on 😑 I would not buy these candles for an event unless it’s a haunted house.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love these! I have two sets and they look so nice and real! I love the different settings for brightness, time and candle or light. I highly recommend if you want something that looks like a real candle bur isn’t. Also I have these on constantly at night and the battery last pretty long so I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Zentz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but one stop working after 2 days 😞
customer_reviews.text: One candle stopped flickering after only 2 days which is frustrating. Candles feel real and are the perfect size for a mantle. I like the dimmer feature, I prefer the dimmer light because it is less orange like that. The candles do flicker different when on the lowest light setting, when at full brightness they flicker the same way and look fake. Be very gentle with the battery lid it isn’t attached very well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Some didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Two of the first six candles I unwrapped did not work after inserting batteries, so didn't bother to unwrap the remaining three candles. The battery doors are cheap and awkward to use as the spring gets in the way of inserting the batteries. Finally, I didn't pay attention to the depth and was disappointed to realize they weren't 3" deep. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They're a lot more orange than in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're a lot more orange than in the photos, but it's a warm light which is nice. Love the options between solid light and candle flickering and they're dimmable! Bought two sets for a Harry Potter birthday party, but will definitely keep them around as decor. Nice wax exteriors, a great assortment of sizes - Everything worked from the first, and although they need 2 batteries each they arrived in great condition. Bought rechargeable AAs to cut down on waste. One remote worked for both... but then again the remote for our TV sound bar can also turn them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Techtress88

customer_reviews.title: Love my flameless candle set!!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of candles!! Put them all over the house and in my daughter's room. She loves them. Remote works awesome. Especially for ones you set up on high shelves. Candles do not come with batteries and each candle does require 2 AA batteries. They are real wax candles and smell really nice too. I will be buying a few more sets to give out at Christmas. Definitely a great set of candles for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Use them as a nightlight and when I'm doing yoga. They give off just the amount of brightness and I love that it has a remote control to adjust the brightness and whether I want it to flicker like a real candle or give off a steady light. Also great for a romantic candlelight dinner. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: eyerisfgr

customer_reviews.title: Decent but could use some improvements.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and I have mixed feelings. They are all the same thickness around which makes them look like alter candles (which they’d be good for) and are a bit orange in the light. They do have a dimming feature but I can’t get all the candles to match. Also, these require 18 batteries which is a lot. I suggest rechargeable batteries. They don’t operate well at the same time, I think that’s the biggest complaint. No color options either.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: More Than Satisfied, Great Product, Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for about a month now and I am VERY satisfied. In fact, they exceeded my expectations. And the seller was -very- supportive with the minor problem I had. When placed above eye-level (like on the fireplace, or a top shelf with the 'flicker' effect, they are absolutely indistinguishable from a real candle. I have them going for 8 hours a day, beginning at 4PM (they automatically recycle each day) and the two AA batteries haven't run out yet, over 3-4 weeks. VERY SATISFIED.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Work great/ No issues
customer_reviews.text: I'm having none of the problems described by some reviewers and am almost wondering if those are "fake" reviews submitted by competitors. My candles flicker in a natural-seeming way and appear to be real candles, down to the wax. They also make no noise. I really love the remote! Also, while I dont have a fireplace in my short-term accommodations, these candles make it seem warmer and cozier on recent cold-and-gray weather days. I have sometimes forgotten and left them on for many hours after leaving the room, but the battery-life is still good one month after owning these.
customer_reviews.author: Marmom

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT AMBIANCE FOR THE FAMILY ROOM!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way these glow! The light is a soft yellow and the flicker setting is subtle. I bought these to go in my wood bring fireplace for a staged home. They will most definitely find a place of honor in our next home. The timer setting gives you a choice between 2, 4, 6 and 8 hours on. We have tried all the choices and have been very pleased. The remote is self explanatory but the candles come with detailed instructions just in case. The total effect of having so many candles a different heights is impressive. I would have paid more for these but I am delighted to have found them at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Work-of-heart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase for haunted house lighting.
customer_reviews.text: These candles were amazing in our haunted house. They provide different ranges of light as well as the candle flame effect. The ability to use the remote to turn on individual or all lights (depending on proximity) made them a no hassle item. The only reason for 4 star rating was that at least 2 candles from the total purchase of 2 boxes I could not get to work. Overall great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Newman

customer_reviews.title: Decent candles
customer_reviews.text: I really like these candles but you get what you pay for. 9 candles came in the box. 6 candles have consistent coloring in regards to the flickering light but 3 aren’t. These 3 are dim compared to the rest. This is not an issue for me as I separated these 3 candles in a different area. The remote is convenient but I have to be within a couple feet of the candles to use it. Also not a deal breaker because I used it to set the timer for all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alot for your money!
customer_reviews.text: These led candles are absolutely amazing. They are made of real wax which I was unaware of and they smell great too! They have different light adjustments and features. I highly recommend these. They are perfect and very cheap but high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect remote feautres makes for a 'real' candle experience
customer_reviews.text: I finally caved and decided to get fake candles. I couldn't have real ones due to two cats and a puppy that I'm afraid would walk into the flame and catch my house on fire! I did alot of research before buying these and I couldn't be happier. The timer they have for 2,4,6,8 hours are amazing because they turn on automatically once the sun goes down. The real wax makes them really feel and look like real candles. I think my favourite part is the 'flicker' setting they have that makes them so cozy and real!
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by how great they are
customer_reviews.text: Wow! When I ordered these I was not expecting the remote to work as good at it does. They turn on first click and are super cute! The only thing that worried me is on "flicker" mode they were all synced up and flickering at the same time for the first couple minutes, but slowly they started to unsynchronize and looked more realistic. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carna

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like these candles. I’ve only had them for about a week and I plan on using them at my wedding. They take 2 AA batteries and have a solid or flickering setting. I was a little disappointed with the size they are tall but not very big around. The candles also seem to be made of real wax. Overall I’d recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how they got so many great reviews. 6 out of the 9 I could ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with these. I don't know how they got so many great reviews. 6 out of the 9 I could not get to light. I used new batteries -out of the package. When I could get a few to light; if I moved them an inch they would shut off. They are also very thin. They appear much beefier in the the photos. Perhaps I got a bad batch but honestly they seem overall cheap and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of candles!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! They look like real candles and feel like real candles plus they last for so long I left them on during Halloween and they lasted for about four whole days nonstop. Plus the Flickr mode really makes them look like a lit candle. Also the remote has no problem getting to them I was able to turn them on and off through the window even.
customer_reviews.author: Gericke

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift. My recipient was hesitant at first since he's an avid candle user but never considered using an electric candle. He was also a bit annoyed that it took 2 batteries per candles so I shipped him some batteries. Last check, he loved them especially since he can use the remote control. He said he thinks they are real candles now (there is a flicker mode) but cool to the touch and has them all over his house.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get right
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these so much even after reading all the great reviews. They are large and pretty, real wax was a plus except getting them on the timer was almost impossible! Plus to find out they would turn on and off when we turned the channel on the tv or anything like that. They are now unlit decor... kinda pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Kris P-Carter

customer_reviews.title: These candles are not worth the battery price you'll pay.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these, i looked to see if batteries were included and it said yes, they might have changed that info by now for all i know. But i did not receive batteries with my purchase. Another thing is they are quite small. Not the size of an average battery operated candle. They are about 2 and a half inches wide and vary in height.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Allocco

customer_reviews.title: Hygge ~ Love these candles!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles- they look very authentic and add a warm glow. I have had a little issue with the timers, but I may have made a mistake when setting them up. I'm going to gather them all together and reset the time. Oh, and my firefighter husband is very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn T

customer_reviews.title: Only 3 Candles Work
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of them, but when it came time to light them up only 3 out of the 9 candles worked. I used new Duracell batteries in all of them. I even put the batteries from the working candles into the other non-working ones to double check but that didn't work either. So, basically I bought 9 fake candles that have no use to me. Also, the battery covers didn't hold well in some of them and I had to tape them shut. I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Derner

customer_reviews.title: Worked beautiful for the surprise I planned
customer_reviews.text: I was doing a 'fantasy suite' as part of my proposal to my fiancee. The remote works great, I bought 4 boxes and they all talk to one remote. I am only taking off one star because there is a weird plastic reside on the candles that could leave mark on whatever surface you put them in. Please note that these do not include batteries but you can get those cheap from Amazon basics <3
customer_reviews.author: R. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the largest candle was broken when the package arrived. They look great, especially when run on the "candle" function, that makes them flicker softly and pleasantly. Timer works great, and makes it so I can have the candles come on just before I get home from work and walk into a nice environment. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Boulter

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell te difference from real
customer_reviews.text: They look so real visitors can't tell they are not burning . Your description could be better. It states that they 'realistic looking and flicker' It would be better if it stated-- they are not a glass bulb. They have an external wick that is lit by battery and does move like a real flame.
customer_reviews.author: Albert's View

customer_reviews.title: KEEP LOOKING! Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible. At first they were really nice-they looked good. We ordered them for a Christmas play. The kids carried them to the stage and back out. They were unusable after ONE use. The switches broke, they were just so cheaply made - and they were not cheaply priced. I was very disappointed- thankfully there were enough in the box that we could use them for both showings. Afterwards we just threw them away. You are better off getting these at a dollar store. Terrible! So frustrated. Was looking forward to using them as decorations during the holidays
customer_reviews.author: derrickf

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Remote
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to set my candles in the 4 hour timer, but that button on my remote doesn’t work, so I had to set them for 6 hours. It’s a month later and the last candle has “burned out”, signified by flashing on and off. So as a reference, batteries last about a month on the 6 hour timer. Maybe they’d last longer if I could use the 4 hour timer, which would be perfect timing, 8 pm to midnight. Oh well. The candles are pretty, long and skinny. Add a 20 pack of batteries to the monthly budget.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Very natural flicker
customer_reviews.text: These are plastic and wax. They look like regular candles. Comes with a remote control to turn on/off, change the flicker pattern and much more. I'm only giving it 4 stars because one candle does not work. I tried several batteries but it would not work. I took batteries out of functioning candles and tried but no luck. I would gladly buy another set to use in my non-working fireplace. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are so realistic, I love them!! Since they come with a remote control, I don't have to turn each of them on or off since I am able to use the remote. Also with the remote, you are able set the timer for 2, 4, or 6 hours or use them as a lights instead of the flickering of candles. We have two large dogs so I feel a lot safer with them versus candles. I set them on a glass tray with orange marbles so the light from the candles reflects.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Was love at first sight...and then....
customer_reviews.text: I received my order in a very timely manner. looked just as described. put the batteries in. used the remote. candles lit up. I set it for 2 hours. they shut off at 2 hours...........never came on again. tried it manually. tried it with the remote. Nothing. Well....so much for that brief fling.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Payne

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The candles in the photo are different than the ones I received and the batteries are not secure in holder. They do turn on but the remote does NOT WORK. I have tried everything to get it to work and still nothing so there is no timer or candle light function. Each one must be turned on indivially.
customer_reviews.author: Lindzt

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible but not great either.
customer_reviews.text: The slightest “vibration” or if you pick up the candle to dust or move it causes them to turn on. This then resets the timer wasting the battery. I can’t leave them in timer mode. This kind of makes the remote pointless since the candle must be in timer mode to use the remote. They aren’t a terrible product just made very inexpensively. I have many other candles that do not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Z
